channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Congress returns to unfinished business and a new Trump era
item.description: Congress returns to a changed Washington. Lawmakers are back in town this week for the start of what’s called the “lame duck,” the eight-week sprint to finish up this session before the new one begins in January.

item.title: Pentagon secrets leaker Jack Teixeira set to be sentenced, could get up to 17 years in prison
item.description: A Massachusetts Air National Guard member who pleaded guilty to leaking highly classified military documents about the war in Ukraine is expected to be sentenced in federal court Tuesday.

item.title: Ranked voting will decide a pivotal congressional race. How does that work?
item.description: A ranked choice tabulation to determine the winner of a key congressional race in Maine starts Tuesday. Democratic U.S. Rep.
